div.bibl: Svenska Amerikanaren, July 14, 1908. A SWEDISH-AMERICAN NUMBER

body.p: Last Saturday The Saturday Evening Herald published a full-page portrait of Governor John A. Johnson of Minnesota. Besides the article about Governor Johnson, there were others about Carr, about the sending home to Sweden of Captain John Ericsson's belongings, several biographies and the pictures of many distinguished Chicago Swedes and Swedish-American Institutions.
